Medication: Endometriosis treatment includes hormonal therapies, pain relievers, surgical options, and medications like oral contraceptives, NSAIDs, and hormone-based therapies to manage symptoms.
Symptom: Endometriosis symptoms encompass pain, inflammation, fertility issues, and impact on various body systems, highlighting the need for comprehensive treatment and care.
Specialist: Endometriosis treatment involves a multidisciplinary team of healthcare professionals, including doctors, surgeons, and specialists in minimally invasive gynecologic procedures.
Care: Endometriosis care involves personalized treatment, considering pregnancy plans, and managing symptoms like period pain through lifestyle, oral, skin, and foot health.
